response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Our product offers unparalleled value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it is worth $1,000,000 to you. However, I am extending to you an extraordinary offer to purchase this product at a special price of $900,000.

This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a mutually beneficial relationship. I understand the importance of making a decision that aligns with your financial planning, and I assure you that this price reflects a strategic compromise that benefits both parties.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or if you wish to discuss this offer further. I am more than happy to provide you with detailed specifications, testimonials, and case studies to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
